summary: Two weeks before his release, a teenage prisoner learns that his mother has returned home. Meanwhile, he finds himself in love with a student working in the penitentiary as an intern.
cast: George Pistereanu|Ada Condeescu|Mihai Constantin|Clara Voda|Marian Bratu|Papan Chilibar|Mihai Svoristeanu|Alexandru Mititelu|Cristian Dumitru|Laurentiu BÃ£nescu|Aida Economu|Cosmin Padureanu
title: Si quiero silbar, silbo
